compatibility.notes: The BSD-3-Clause-No-Military-License is a permissive license that allows for wide compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL due to their requirements for derivative works.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice and license in all redistributions.
Do not use the names of the copyright holder or contributors without permission.
license.name: BSD-3-Clause-No-Military-License
obligations: Retain copyright notice in source code redistributions.
Include copyright notice and license in binary redistributions.
Obtain permission for using the name of the copyright holder or contributors for endorsement.
